title: Hero Tillakaratne Dilshan led us to safety as bullets rained in – Kent coach Paul Farbrace relives horror of terrorist attack on Sri Lanka team in Pakistan
content: Daily Mail – By Paul Newman Paul Farbrace talks about the day he nearly lost his life in an almost unnervingly matter-of-fact fashion. ‘I was sitting in the team bus when I heard this popping and banging noise,’ said Kent’s new head coach. ‘I looked out of the window and saw this guy running with…
